mood: Solemn and elegiac. Sacred space. Quiet grief. Deep time contemplation. Acceptance of cost. Honor and duty intertwined. Philosophical about forgetting. Beautiful irony of final ansible-speed transmission. Loneliness of void. Connection across impossible distance through remembrance. Patient acknowledgment that future generations probably won't care. Doing it anyway.
pacing: Slow and meditative. Contemplative narration. Long silences. Deep space emptiness. Philosophical conversation with Tal-Kesh. Careful memorial message composition. Reflective ending. Time passing in years. Patient rhythm matching light-speed communication theme.
chapter_purpose: TENTPOLE - Zara completes pilgrimage, honors Lira in person. Shows time dilation effects (19 objective/12 subjective). Demonstrates cultural drift acceleration (17% in 19 years). Reveals Threadkeeper memorial practices. Provides final ansible-speed transmission (ironic honor). Plants return journey complications. Explores memory decay across generations. Reflects on verification as sacred. Prepares for second half of book (Zara's return, Harvester approach).
